title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.249 - Stepdown method
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.249 - Stepdown method

State Regulations

The allocation of the accumulated costs of the
nonrevenue-producing centers to those other nonrevenue-producing centers which
utilize their services, as well as to the revenue-producing centers to which
they render service. Once the costs of a nonrevenue-producing center have been
allocated, that center is considered closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.249

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
